verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <S%H5329><s%> Lam-natz-tze-acho the chief Musician שִׁ֣יר <S%H7892><s%> [TshirA Song מִזְמ֑וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor; [or] Psalm הָרִ֥יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> ha-Ri-'u Make a joyful noise לֵ֝אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> Le-lo-him unto God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. all ye lands

זַמְּר֥וּ <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-Ru Sing forth כְבֽוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> che-Vod- the honour שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo; of his name שִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> Si-mu make כָ֝ב֗וֹד <S%H3519><s%> cha-Vod, glorious תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-la-To. his praise

אִמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> 'im-Ru Say לֵ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> Le-lo-him unto God מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- How נּוֹרָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> no-Ra How terrible מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sei-cha; [art thou in] thy works בְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> be-Ro through the greatness עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-ze-cha, of thy power יְֽכַחֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H3584><s%> ye-cha-cha-Shu submit לְךָ֣ le-Cha אֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-cha. shall thine enemies

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All הָאָ֤רֶץ׀ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz All the earth יִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <S%H7812><s%> yish-ta-cha-Vu shall worship לְ֭ךָ Le-cha וִֽיזַמְּרוּ־ <S%H2167><s%> vi-zam-me-ru- thee and shall sing לָ֑ךְ Lach; יְזַמְּר֖וּ <S%H2167><s%> ye-zam-me-Ru unto thee they shall sing שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha [to] thy name סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu Come וּ֭רְאוּ <S%H7200><s%> U-re-'u and see מִפְעֲל֣וֹת <S%H4659><s%> mif-'a-Lot the works אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; of God נוֹרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> no-Ra [he is] terrible עֲ֝לִילָ֗ה <S%H5949><s%> 'a-li-Lah, [in his] doing עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- toward בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei toward the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam. of men

הָ֤פַךְ <S%H2015><s%> Ha-fach He turned יָ֨ם׀ <S%H3220><s%> yam the sea לְֽיַבָּשָׁ֗ה <S%H3004><s%> le-yab-ba-Shah, into dry בַּ֭נָּהָר <S%H5104><s%> Ban-na-hor through the flood יַֽעַבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> ya-'av-Ru [land] they went בְרָ֑גֶל <S%H7272><s%> ve-Ra-gel; on foot שָׁ֝֗ם <S%H8033><s%> m There נִשְׂמְחָה־ <S%H8055><s%> nis-me-chah- there did we rejoice בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

מֹ֘שֵׁ֤ל <S%H4910><s%> mo-Shel He ruleth בִּגְבוּרָת֨וֹ׀ <S%H1369><s%> big-vu-ra-To by his power עוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam, for ever עֵ֭ינָיו <S%H5869><s%> 'Ei-nav his eyes בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim the nations תִּצְפֶּ֑ינָה <S%H6822><s%> titz-Pei-nah; behold הַסּוֹרְרִ֓ים׀ <S%H5637><s%> has-sor-Rim let not the rebellious אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay; יָרִימוּ ya-ri-mu כיָר֖וּמוּ <S%H7311><s%> ya-Ru-mu bring up קלָ֣מוֹ la-mo סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. themselves Selah

בָּרְכ֖וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-re-Chu O bless עַמִּ֥ים׀ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim ye people אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God וְ֝הַשְׁמִ֗יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> ve-hash-Mi-'u, to be heard ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol and make the voice תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-la-To. of his praise

הַשָּׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> has-Sam Which holdeth נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ <S%H5315><s%> Naf-she-nu our soul בַּֽחַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> ba-chai-Yim; in life וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and does not נָתַ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan and suffereth לַמּ֣וֹט <S%H4132><s%> lam-Mot to be moved רַגְלֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Le-nu. not our feet

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for בְחַנְתָּ֥נוּ <S%H974><s%> ve-chan-Ta-nu hast proved אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; For thou O God צְ֝רַפְתָּ֗נוּ <S%H6884><s%> tze-raf-Ta-nu, us thou hast tried כִּצְרָף־ <S%H6884><s%> kitz-rof- is tried כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef. us as silver

הֲבֵאתָ֥נוּ <S%H935><s%> ha-ve-Ta-nu Thou broughtest בַמְּצוּדָ֑ה <S%H4686><s%> vam-me-tzu-Dah; us into the net שַׂ֖מְתָּ <S%H7760><s%> Sam-ta thou laidst מוּעָקָ֣ה <S%H4157><s%> mu-'a-Kah affliction בְמָתְנֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H4975><s%> ve-ma-te-Nei-nu. upon our loins

הִרְכַּ֥בְתָּ <S%H7392><s%> hir-Kav-ta to ride אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> e-Noosh, Thou hast caused men לְרֹ֫אשֵׁ֥נוּ <S%H7218><s%> le-Ro-She-nu over our heads בָּֽאנוּ־ <S%H935><s%> ba-nu- we went בָאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> va-'Esh through fire וּבַמַּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> u-vam-Ma-yim; and through water וַ֝תּוֹצִיאֵ֗נוּ <S%H3318><s%> vat-to-tzi-'E-nu, but thou broughtest us out לָֽרְוָיָֽה׃ <S%H7310><s%> La-re-va-Yah. into a wealthy

אָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> a-Vo I will go בֵיתְךָ֣ <S%H1004><s%> vei-te-Cha into thy house בְעוֹל֑וֹת <S%H5930><s%> ve-'o-Lot; with burnt offerings אֲשַׁלֵּ֖ם <S%H7999><s%> 'a-shal-Lem I will pay לְךָ֣ le-Cha נְדָרָֽי׃ <S%H5088><s%> ne-da-Rai. thee my vows

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- Which פָּצ֥וּ <S%H6475><s%> pa-Tzu have uttered שְׂפָתָ֑י <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Tai; Which my lips וְדִבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-ber- hath spoken פִּ֝֗י <S%H6310><s%> Pi, and my mouth בַּצַּר־ <S%H6862><s%> batz-tzar- when I was in trouble לִֽי׃ Li.

עֹ֘ל֤וֹת <S%H5930><s%> o-Lot unto thee burnt sacrifices מֵחִ֣ים <S%H4220><s%> me-Chim of fatlings אַעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-'a-leh- I will offer לָּ֭ךְ lach עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- With קְטֹ֣רֶת <S%H7004><s%> ke-To-ret with the incense אֵילִ֑ים <S%H352><s%> 'ei-Lim; of rams אֶ֥עֱשֶֽׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'E-'e-seh I will offer בָקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> va-Kar bullocks עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with עַתּוּדִ֣ים <S%H6260><s%> 'at-tu-Dim with goats סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

לְכֽוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> le-chu- Come שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U [and] hear וַ֭אֲסַפְּרָה <S%H5608><s%> Va-'a-sap-pe-rah and I will declare כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִרְאֵ֣י <S%H3373><s%> yir-'Ei all ye that fear אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; God אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of what עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah what he hath done לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> le-naf-Shi. for my soul

אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him פִּֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> pi- unto him with my mouth קָרָ֑אתִי <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra-ti; I cried וְ֝רוֹמַ֗ם <S%H7318><s%> ve-ro-Mam, be extolled תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat with לְשׁוֹנִֽי׃ <S%H3956><s%> le-sho-Ni. my tongue

אָ֭וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven iniquity אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If רָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti If I regard בְלִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> ve-lib-Bi; in my heart לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo will not יִשְׁמַ֣ע׀ <S%H8085><s%> yish-Ma' will not hear אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai. the Lord

אָ֭כֵן <S%H403><s%> 'A-chen [But] verily שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma' hath heard אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; God הִ֝קְשִׁ֗יב <S%H7181><s%> hik-Shiv, [me] he hath attended בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol to the voice תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti. of my prayer

בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; [be] God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor הֵסִ֘יר <S%H5493><s%> he-Sir which hath not turned away תְּפִלָּתִ֥י <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti my prayer וְ֝חַסְדּ֗וֹ <S%H2617><s%> ve-chas-Do, nor his mercy מֵאִתִּֽי׃ <S%H854><s%> me-'it-Ti. chief
